[pagebreak]

Crypt of the Heart by Ariana Dumas

[pagebreak]

When it comes to tales of bravery and valor, few have a greater claim than the Knightly Orders of High Rock. Like the Knights of the Rose in Wayrest, many serve as royal guardians and protectors of the realm. It is through their defense of king and country that their fame resounds. Yet others swear an oath of a different kind. Not bound by the walls of their kingdom, they scour the hills in search of Reachmen, witches, and Forsworn, pledging to deliver justice where savagery and chaos rule. One such group refers to themselves as the Order of the Crypt. At first glance, the name might seem ironic, but the Crypt of Hearts they swore to protect went beyond the underground chamber in Shornhelm. The knights pledged to protect the hearts entombed in all of us, lest they be replaced with the briars of the unholy. Yet despite the air of nobility they carried, in the Reach these knights were known by a different name; The War Mages of Shornhelm. For they gave no mercy to the wicked, and the land they tread was riven with scars made of fire and sword. Why the knights chose to extend beyond the kingdom is a matter of debate. Much of it can be traced to a blood feud, and the death of a knight named Simon Rodayne. Tricked by the witch Daenalla, a Sister of the Beldama Coven, his heart was stolen and replaced with a briarheart. In retaliation, his acolytes drove the coven further and further east, killing any Reachmen who would dare give them quarter. Yet in huts small and muddy with smoke, the oral histories tell a different story. They say Simon gave his heart willingly to the witch, and together they fled the wrath of both their clans, knowing they would receive neither understanding nor forgiveness. When Simon died, Daenalla returned his heart to him, and buried him at the altar where they wed. Such was the pain of her loss that she wept from the Morning to the Evening Star, until her tears flooded the canyon below and became one with the river Karth. To this day, Simon's ghost is said to haunt the pass below his grave, watching over the river which bears his beloved's tears. Whether any of that is true or simply the embellishments of history, none can say with certainty. However, it is worth noting that the grave itself exists. Whether the heart inside belongs to Simon or another, is a question for its keeper.

[pagebreak]

心之墓穴 作者 亞利安娜．杜馬斯

[pagebreak]

說到英勇豪邁的事蹟，應該少有人能與高岩省個騎士團匹敵。他們跟途歇城的薔薇騎士一樣，很多擔任王室與國土的守護者，因為保護君主與國家，贏得響亮的名聲。 但是也有人立下的誓言不一樣，他們並不是留在王國的城牆內，而是在丘陵中掃蕩邊塞人、女巫與棄誓者，在野蠻與混亂所主宰的荒野中，堅持帶來正義的力量。 有一個這樣的團體，自稱墓穴騎士團。乍聽之下這樣的名字可能讓人覺得諷刺，但他們立誓保護的心之墓穴，不只是熊海姆城的地下洞穴而已。這些騎士發誓保護的，還有深藏在每個人體內的心臟，以免被不潔的荊棘取代。 但墓穴騎士團雖然有著如此尊貴的名聲，邊塞領的人卻給他們另一個稱呼：熊海姆戰爭法師。因為這些人對邪惡毫不仁慈，他們所在的土地，滿是戰火與暴力留下的傷痕。 為何這群騎士選擇脫離王國範圍，現在仍有爭議。主要的原因是一位名叫賽門．羅丹的騎士之死所造成的世仇。賽門遭到貝達瑪女巫團的成員黛妮拉欺騙，心臟被她偷走，只留下一顆荊棘之心取代。為了復仇，他的追隨者將女巫團向東驅逐，任何膽敢庇護女巫的邊塞人也格殺勿論。 但是在煙霧瀰漫的簡陋小屋中流傳的口傳歷史，說法卻完全不同。他們說賽門是自願把心臟送給女巫的，兩人一起逃離各自所屬的勢力，因為他們知道不會有人理解他們，也不會有人原諒他們。 賽門死後，黛妮拉將他的心臟還給他，並且將他葬在兩人成婚的聖壇。失去賽門讓她極為痛苦，從早哭到晚，她的眼淚流進了下方的山谷，與卡斯河結為一體。 直到今天，當地仍然相傳賽門的鬼魂在墳墓下方的山谷徘徊不去，守護著愛人眼淚所匯集而成的河流。 這一切究竟真有其事，還是只是編造出來的歷史傳奇，現在已經難以判斷。不過值得指出這座墳墓是真實存在的，至於墳墓內的心臟是賽門的還是屬於其他人，就只有守墓人知道了。

We've received reports that the Beldama witches have resurfaced in the Reach.

I'm calling upon all willing and able knights to cleanse the land of witches, hags, and Reachmen. Remember always the death of our sworn brother, Simon Rodayne, for the Order of the Crypt, and for all of Shornhelm.

-- Knight Captain Rainore
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
我們接獲通報，邊塞領又出現了貝達瑪女巫。

呼籲所有具備能力與意願的騎士，掃除本地的女巫、鬼婆與邊塞人。要永遠記得我們的兄弟賽門．羅丹之死，為了墓穴騎士團、為了整個熊海姆。

——騎士團長雷諾爾
</font>

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
We have stalked our sister Daenella for years, reading the feathers and bones, for not even a witch of Beldama can escape the eye of the coven. 

Using the crow's sight, we found her upon an altar in the Reach. Time and age did little to fool us. She is the one who betrayed us to the knights. 

Such an act deserves a cruel death, but simply killing the traitor will not be enough for the ward mother's vengeance. 

We will corrupt her beloved's heart and return it tainted, damning his soul for eternity. She will know this as she dies upon the rock.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
我們憑著羽毛與骨頭的跡象，追蹤我們姐妹黛妮拉已經有好幾年的時間了。即使是貝達瑪的女巫，也逃不了女巫團的視線。

我們利用烏鴉之眼，在邊塞領的一處聖壇找到了她。時間過這麼久，她也年華老去，但片不了我們。將我們出賣給騎士的就是她。

這樣的罪行，應該讓她痛苦的死亡，但是殺死叛徒還滿足不了結界之母的復仇心。

我們會腐化她的情人的心臟，讓他的受到永世的詛咒。她死在石頭上時，也要讓她知道這件事。
</font>

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
I've heard a lot of strange tales in the Reach. Witches turning men into frogs, wolves the size of bears, things like that. There's even a story about an old knight's tomb, and a ghost haunting the Reach.

Now, normally I brush off such talk. The emptier the bottle, the taller the tale. 

But what I saw last night changed my mind. I was heading south toward Dushnikh Yal, to set up camp and mine the hills in the morning. I had just crossed the river, when I saw something come out of the fog. 

It was just like in the stories. He looked like a man cast from the moonlight. I could see him, and at the same, I could see right through him. Not only that, he was dressed in some armor I've never seen, and bade me to follow him up the hillside. 

But I did no such thing. Instead I dropped my knapsack, turned tail and ran. Call me a snowback, a milk-drinker, I don't care. No good can come from following the dead. There's is a place no man wants to visit.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
我在邊塞領聽過很多奇聞，像是女巫把人變成青蛙、跟熊一樣大的野狼這種怪事。甚至還有一段故事在講某個古早時代騎士的墳墓，說那個騎士現在還陰魂不散。

通常這種話我是一概不信的。反正酒喝得越多，話就說得越誇張。

可是我昨天晚上看到的事，改變了我的看法。我向南往杜什尼克亞爾走，準備紮營，隔天早上要在丘陵採礦。剛過河，我就看到霧中出現人影。

跟故事說的一樣，那人的身體看起來像是月光，雖然看得見，卻也看得透。他穿著我從沒看過的護甲，還要我跟他走上山坡。

我才沒有聽他的話，而是丟下我的包袱，拔腿就跑。說我是軟骨頭也好，膽小鬼也罷，我都不在乎。跟著死人走不可能有好事的。那種地方不會有人想去。
</font>
